name: Testo Ltd
description:
Testo is a leading manufacturer of high quality measuring instruments. We heavily invest in product research and development at our headquarters in Germany to guarantee we offer our customers instruments that deliver durability, functionality and ease of use.
Testo also offers instrument service and calibration from our independently accredited ISO 9001:2008 and ISO17025 laboratory.

product_images.title: Testo 570
product_images.description:
Measure digitally and work efficiently with Testo Digital Manifolds. Testo 550, 557 and 570 Digital Manifold range do justice to all daily applications in the refrigeration trade. They can measure various operating parameters with only one instrument. 
Testo 570 is suitable for all demanding activities e.g. storing and documenting measurement data.

product_images.title: Testo 320
product_images.description: The Testo 320 is the new, multi-function flue gas analyser, making it a reliable instrument for flue gas analysis. With a revolutionary high resolution, coloured graphics display, the measurement results are digitally displayed with graphics screen options. With its wide measuring capability the Testo 320 quickly determines and eliminates malfunctions, monitors legal limit values and spot checks in daily routine work on servicing heating systems.

product_images.title: Testo 875i
product_images.description: A high quality Thermal Imaging Camera-now at an even more attractive price. The range has recently been upgraded and the new Testo 875i range now offers even more features and benefits.

product_images.title: Testo 310
product_images.description: Testo's new entry level flue gas analyser is ideal for carrying out flue gas analysis, checking the basic settings of a newly installed system or providing maintenanceon a heating system. With easy handling and long battery lifetimes the Testo 310 is a robust tool for daily work on all critical measurements of any heating system.
